trans-unit.source: ReentrancyMode LogicalCallContext allows reentrant calls into actor methods provided the method invocation calls belong to same Logical call context sequence.
trans-unit.target: ReentrancyMode LogicalCallContext allows reentrant calls into actor methods provided the method invocation calls belong to same Logical call context sequence.

trans-unit.source: All other calls into actor methods will be blocked and will execute on turn based concurrency model.
trans-unit.target: All other calls into actor methods will be blocked and will execute on turn based concurrency model.

trans-unit.source: ReentrancyMode Disallowed specifies that reentrant calls to actor methods will be disallowed.
trans-unit.target: ReentrancyMode Disallowed specifies that reentrant calls to actor methods will be disallowed.

trans-unit.source: An exception of type FabricException will be thrown if caller attemtps a reentrant call on Actors that are decorated with ReentrancyMode Disallowed attribute
trans-unit.target: An exception of type FabricException will be thrown if caller attemtps a reentrant call on Actors that are decorated with ReentrancyMode Disallowed attribute
